clinical_question: Should patients with MTX-naïve and non-MTX csDMARDs exposed RA and moderate to high disease activity, receive long-term (≥ 3 months) low dose (≤ 10mg per day) GCs and mono- or combination csDMARDs or mono or combination csDMARDs alone?
population: Patients with MTX-naïve and non-MTX csDMARDs exposed RA and moderate to high disease activity
intervention: Mono or combination csDMARDs with long-term (≥ 3 months) low dose (≤ 10mg per day) GCs
comparator: mono or combination csDMARDs alone (i.e. without long-term GCs)
outcome: Disability (follow up: 2 years; assessed with: HAQ)

Imprecision.rationales: Downgraded by two levels due to very serious imprecision. Confidence interval includes both values suggesting no effect and values suggesting harm. Small sample size.

Annotation.data:
1. csDMARD includes SSZ with long-term (>=3 months) prednisone (7mg/day).
2. csDMARD monotherapy includes SSZ.

Effect.Abbreviations: CI: Confidence interval; RR: Risk ratio; MD: Mean difference; HR: Hazard Ratio
